title: Anyone else experiencing this?
body: So late last night I had a very big Windows update (windows anniversary update i think) it took 2 hours to do that and I woke up had a game and had FPS drops through the whole game. My graphics card and everything was all good before this update however I thought it was the graphics card so I did the latest update on my graphics card and it said on it windows anniversary and still the same issue with the fps. Does anyone know what is going on or is experiencing the same thing? I would like this fixed ASAP if anyone would like to help me out thanks.

replies.body: What graphic settings do you normally run league at? The Windows update could have very well changed them back to standard default
Medium high is normal with 60 fps, everything was fine since that big update from last night

> [{quoted}](name=Xenomazul,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=eukEcAJU,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-09-15T09:07:12.040+0000)
>
> Medium high is normal with 60 fps, everything was fine since that big update from last night

i assume you have an nvidia gc so make sure you have the latest bios update, power is set to prefer max performance, vertical sync is off, threaded optimization is off (not a big deal), and triple buffering is off
It happened to me as well, was fine before i updated windows and now my fps keeps dropping to 10 fps for most of the game.
How do we fix this? I need help ASAP
